column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The food was amazing. My boyfriend said the ribeye was the best steak he's ever had. I had a salad with apples and pecans
column2: which was delicious and fresh. We tried to truffle mac and cheese
column3: which was perfectly creamy and nicely browned on top. But
column5: the elote corn was the star. I've been searching all over Rhode Island trying to find something that comes close and it doesn't exist.
